scores.notes: Cycle 12 evaluation. No active work. All services healthy. UX-003 next.

history.notes: Normalizer validated. Cloudflare gap identified. Pivot to embedded menus.
Focus on embedded Dutchie menus. Parallel research on stealth techniques.
Identified 9 retailers (18 locations) with embedded Dutchie menus. Created retailer list and strategy doc.
Dashboard real-time updates with LiveIndicator, useLastUpdated hook, and visual feedback on data changes
Stealth research complete. iHeartJane free API discovered. Browserless BQL recommended for CF bypass. DATA-002 unblocked.
HTTP benchmarks: p95<115ms, 938 RPS. Full Convex query benchmarks blocked on CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY. Scripts created for future runs.
No active work. Both services healthy. DATA-002 (iHeartJane) ready to start.
OCM license sync complete. 580 total licenses, 467 active, 238 operational. DATA-002 blocked (iHeartJane now CF-protected). Created Convex integration + CLI scripts.
No active work. Services healthy (Convex + Browser Worker). Next task: UX-002 (dashboard filtering/search).
Dashboard search/filter implemented. SearchFilter component, debounced search, text highlighting, sorting, result counts.
No active work. Both services healthy (Convex + Browser Worker). Next: PERF-002 (caching).
Stats cache implemented. New statsCache table, cache.ts module with queries/mutations, dashboard uses cache, HTTP endpoints /cache/refresh and /cache/info. Requires CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY to deploy.
No active work. Both services healthy (Convex + Browser Worker). 10 tasks complete. Next: UX-003 (mobile responsive).
